charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO MANUFACTURE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE did attempt to manufacture a quantity of 3,4 methylenedioxymethamphetamine (commonly known as MDMA and &;quot;Ecstasy&;quot;), a Schedule I controlled substance, in violation of Title 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) (1)

21:841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C) CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-MANUFACTURE did manufacture a quantity of 3,4 methylenedioxymethamphetamine (commonly known as MDMA and &;quot;Ecstasy&;quot;), a Schedule I controlled substance (2)

21:858 ENDANGERING LIFE MANUFACTURING CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE while manufacturing and attempting to manufacture a controlled substance in violation of Chapter 13 of Title 21 USC; to wit: 3,4 methylenedioxymethamphetamine (commonly known as MDMA and &;quot;Ecstasy&;quot;), a Schedule I controlled substance; did create a substantial risk to human life (3)
21:841(a)(1) possess withintent to distribute and manufacture MDMA/Ecstasy
